ä¸€ã€åˆ©ç”¨ ES6 Set å»é‡ï¼ˆES6 ä¸­æœ€å¸¸ç”¨ï¼‰

function unique (arr) {
  return Array.from(new Set(arr))
}
var arr = [1,1,'true','true',true,true,15,15,false,false, undefined,undefined, null,null, NaN, NaN,'NaN', 0, 0, 'a', 'a',{},{}]
console.log(unique(arr))
 //[1, "true", true, 15, false, undefined, null, NaN, "NaN", 0, "a", {}, {}]

ç‰¹ç‚¹:ä¸è€ƒè™‘å…¼å®¹æ€§ï¼Œè¿™ç§å»é‡çš„æ–¹æ³•ä»£ç æœ€å°‘ã€‚è¿™ç§æ–¹æ³•è¿˜æ— æ³•å»æ‰{}ç©ºå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œåé¢çš„é«˜é˜¶æ–¹æ³•ä¼šæ·»åŠ å»æ‰é‡å¤{}çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

äºŒã€åˆ©ç”¨foråµŒå¥—forï¼Œç„¶åspliceå»é‡ï¼ˆES5 ä¸­æœ€å¸¸ç”¨ï¼‰

function unique(arr){            
        for(var i=0; i<arr.length; i++){
            for(var j=i+1; j<arr.length; j++){
                if(arr[i]==arr[j]){         //ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç­‰åŒäºç¬¬äºŒä¸ªï¼Œspliceæ–¹æ³•åˆ é™¤ç¬¬äºŒä¸ª
                    arr.splice(j,1)
                    j--
                }
            }
        }
return arr;
}
var arr = [1,1,'true','true',true,true,15,15,false,false, undefined,undefined, null,null, NaN, NaN,'NaN', 0, 0, 'a', 'a',{},{}]
console.log(unique(arr))
//[1, "true", 15, false, undefined, NaN, NaN, "NaN", "a", {}, {}]

ç‰¹ç‚¹:åŒå±‚å¾ªç¯ï¼Œå¤–å±‚å¾ªç¯å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå†…å±‚å¾ªç¯æ—¶æ¯”è¾ƒå€¼ã€‚å€¼ç›¸åŒæ—¶ï¼Œåˆ™åˆ å»è¿™ä¸ªå€¼ã€‚NaNå’Œ{}æ²¡æœ‰å»é‡ï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªnullç›´æ¥æ¶ˆå¤±äº†

ä¸‰ã€åˆ©ç”¨ indexOf å»é‡

function unique(arr) {
    if (!Array.isArray(arr)) {
        console.log('type error!')
        return
    }
    var array = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
        if (array.indexOf(arr[i]) === -1) {
            array.push(arr[i])
        }
    }
    return array;
}
var arr = [1,1,'true','true',true,true,15,15,false,false, undefined,undefined, null,null, NaN, NaN,'NaN', 0, 0, 'a', 'a',{},{}];
console.log(unique(arr))
// [1, "true", true, 15, false, undefined, null, NaN, NaN, "NaN", 0, "a", {}, {}]

ç‰¹ç‚¹:æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç©ºçš„ç»“æœæ•°ç»„ï¼Œforå¾ªç¯åŸæ•°ç»„ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­ç»“æœæ•°ç»„æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨å½“å‰å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„å€¼åˆ™è·³è¿‡ï¼Œä¸ç›¸åŒåˆ™pushè¿›æ•°ç»„ã€‚NaNã€{}æ²¡æœ‰å»é‡ã€‚

å››ã€åˆ©ç”¨ sort()

function unique(arr) {
    if (!Array.isArray(arr)) {
        console.log('type error!')
        return;
    }
    arr = arr.sort()
    var arrry= [arr[0]];
    for (var i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
        if (arr[i] !== arr[i-1]) {
            arrry.push(arr[i]);
        }
    }
    return arrry;
}
     var arr = [1,1,'true','true',true,true,15,15,false,false, undefined,undefined, null,null, NaN, NaN,'NaN', 0, 0, 'a', 'a',{},{}];
        console.log(unique(arr))
// [0, 1, 15, "NaN", NaN, NaN, {}, {}, "a", false, null, true, "true", undefined]

ç‰¹ç‚¹:åˆ©ç”¨sort()æ’åºæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç„¶åæ ¹æ®æ’åºåçš„ç»“æœè¿›è¡Œéå†åŠç›¸é‚»å…ƒç´ æ¯”å¯¹ã€‚NaNã€{}æ²¡æœ‰å»é‡ã€‚

äº”ã€åˆ©ç”¨ includes()

function unique(arr) {
    if (!Array.isArray(arr)) {
        console.log('type error!')
        return
    }
    var array =[]
    for(var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
            if(!array.includes(arr[i])) {//includes æ£€æµ‹æ•°ç»„æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æŸä¸ªå€¼
                array.push(arr[i])
            }
    }
    return array
}
var arr = [1,1,'true','true',true,true,15,15,false,false, undefined,undefined, null,null, NaN, NaN,'NaN', 0, 0, 'a', 'a',{},{}]
console.log(unique(arr))
//[1, "true", true, 15, false, undefined, null, NaN, "NaN", 0, "a", {}, {}]

ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š{}æ²¡æœ‰å»é‡

å…­ã€åˆ©ç”¨ hasOwnProperty

function unique(arr) {
    var obj = {};
    return arr.filter(function(item, index, arr){
        return obj.hasOwnProperty(typeof item + item) ? false : (obj[typeof item + item] = true)
    })
}
var arr = [1,1,'true','true',true,true,15,15,false,false, undefined,undefined, null,null, NaN, NaN,'NaN', 0, 0, 'a', 'a',{},{}];
console.log(unique(arr))
//[1, "true", true, 15, false, undefined, null, NaN, "NaN", 0, "a", {}]

ç‰¹ç‚¹:åˆ©ç”¨ hasOwnProperty åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨å¯¹è±¡å±æ€§,æ‰€æœ‰çš„éƒ½å»é‡äº†

ä¸ƒã€åˆ©ç”¨ filter

function unique(arr) {
  return arr.filter(function(item, index, arr) {
    //å½“å‰å…ƒç´ ï¼Œåœ¨åŸå§‹æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç´¢å¼•==å½“å‰ç´¢å¼•å€¼ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›å½“å‰å…ƒç´ 
    return arr.indexOf(item, 0) === index;
  });
}
    var arr = [1,1,'true','true',true,true,15,15,false,false, undefined,undefined, null,null, NaN, NaN,'NaN', 0, 0, 'a', 'a',{},{}];
        console.log(unique(arr))
//[1, "true", true, 15, false, undefined, null, "NaN", 0, "a", {}, {}]

ç‰¹ç‚¹:åˆ©ç”¨ filterè¿‡æ»¤çš„æ–¹æ³•é€šè¿‡ç´¢å¼•æ¯”å¯¹ï¼Œ{}æ²¡æœ‰å»é‡

å…«ã€åˆ©ç”¨ Map æ•°æ®ç»“æ„å»é‡

function arrayNonRepeatfy(arr) {
  let map = new Map();
  let array = new Array();  // æ•°ç»„ç”¨äºè¿”å›ç»“æœ
  for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
    if(map.has(arr[i])) {  // å¦‚æœæœ‰è¯¥keyå€¼
      map.set(arr[i], true); 
    } else { 
      map.set(arr[i], false);   // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰è¯¥keyå€¼
      array.push(arr[i]);
    }
  } 
  return array ;
}
 var arr = [1,1,'true','true',true,true,15,15,false,false, undefined,undefined, null,null, NaN, NaN,'NaN', 0, 0, 'a', 'a',{},{}];
    console.log(unique(arr))
//[1, "a", "true", true, 15, false, 1, {}, null, NaN, NaN, "NaN", 0, "a", {}, undefined]

ç‰¹ç‚¹:åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç©º Map æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œéå†éœ€è¦å»é‡çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼ŒæŠŠæ•°ç»„çš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ä½œä¸º key å­˜åˆ° Map ä¸­ã€‚ç”±äº Map ä¸­ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°ç›¸åŒçš„ key å€¼ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ€ç»ˆå¾—åˆ°çš„å°±æ˜¯å»é‡åçš„ç»“æœã€‚NaN,{}æ²¡æœ‰å»é‡
